text: Jevan Bryce Snead (September 2, 1987 â€“ September 21, 2019) was an American football quarterback. He played college football at Mississippi after sitting behind Colt McCoy for Texas. He was signed by the Tampa Bay Buccaneers as an undrafted free agent and then cut. Snead was also a pre-season member of the Tampa Bay Storm. Snead died on September 17, 2019 in Austin, Texas at the age of 32. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Jevan Snead
